TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class X509CertificateDatabase : IDisposable, MimeKit.Cryptography.IX509CertificateDatabase, Org.BouncyCastle.X509.Store.IX509Store

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit X509CertificateDatabase extends System.Object implements class MimeKit.Cryptography.IX509CertificateDatabase, class Org.BouncyCastle.X509.Store.IX509Store, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An X.509 certificate database.
Docs.remarks: An X.509 certificate database is used for storing certificates, metdata related to the certificates (such as encryption algorithms supported by the associated client), certificate revocation lists (CRLs), and private keys.

MemberSignature.Value: protected X509CertificateDatabase (string password);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string password) cil managed

Docs.param: The password used for encrypting and decrypting the private keys.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.remarks: The password is used to encrypt and decrypt private keys in the database and cannot be null.

MemberSignature.Value: protected Org.BouncyCastle.Asn1.DerObjectIdentifier EncryptionAlgorithm { get; set; }
.property instance class Org.BouncyCastle.Asn1.DerObjectIdentifier EncryptionAlgorithm

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the algorithm used for encrypting the private keys.

remarks.para: The encryption algorithm should be one of the PBE (password-based encryption) algorithms supported by Bouncy Castle.
The default algorithm is SHA-256 + AES256.
